meanings.definition: People who achieve more than expected or surpass others in their accomplishments.
meanings.sent1: Superachievers inspire others with their hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent2: The school recognized the superachievers at the award ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The superachievers in the marathon were so fast, they finished before the race even started!
meanings.sent4: In the world of superheroes, superachievers would be the ones with extraordinary powers.
meanings.sent5: The team of superachievers set a new record that seemed impossible to beat.

meanings.definition: The act of achieving at an exceptionally high level.
meanings.sent1: The superachievers in the company always meet their targets ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: Hard work and determination are key factors in becoming a superachiever.
meanings.sent3: The superachievers at the baking competition made a cake so tall it touched the ceiling!
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, superachievers are like rockstars who sell out stadiums.
meanings.sent5: The superachievers in the science fair impressed the judges with their innovative projects.
